description: n-th positive integer having no fewer base 9 runs of even length than odd.
comments: Differs from A037997 if we consider the integer 730 (base 9 1001), for example, which has 2 runs of odd length, 1 run of even length and maximum run length 2. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 20 2008]
author: _Clark Kimberling_
